alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Shelby (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 1:31AM CDT until May 18 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Harrison County in southwestern Iowa... West central Shelby County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 130 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Woodbine, or 18 miles west of Harlan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Harrison and west central Shelby Counties, including the following locations... Schaben Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
